card.text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

card.text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Stalwart Pathlighter

card.name: Stitcher Geralf
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.

card.name: Sunken Hollow
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.Equip {1}

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Syphon Flesh
card.text: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

card.name: Tainted Isle
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {U} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {U} or {B}. Talisman of Dominance deals 1 damage to you.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {G} or {W}. Talisman of Unity deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Temple of Deceit
card.text: Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped.When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.){T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Temple of the False God
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Tomb Tyrant
card.text: Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return a Zombie creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn and only if there are at least three Zombie creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Tomb Tyrant
card.text: Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return a Zombie creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn and only if there are at least three Zombie creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Trostani's Summoner
card.text: When Trostani's Summoner enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, and a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample.

card.name: Unbreakable Formation
card.text: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Unclaimed Territory
card.text: As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.{T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

card.name: Undead Alchemist
card.text: If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player mills that many cards.Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from their library, exile that card and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Undead Augur
card.text: Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Verdurous Gearhulk
card.text: TrampleWhen Verdurous Gearhulk enters the battlefield, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

card.name: Victory's Envoy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Wall of Mourning
card.text: DefenderWhen Wall of Mourning enters the battlefield, exile a card from the top of your library face down for each opponent you have.Coven — At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, put a card exiled with Wall of Mourning into its owner's hand.

card.name: Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver

card.name: Yavimaya Elder
